00043 /********************************/
00044 /* Command Message Data Formats */
00045 /********************************/
00056 typedef struct
00057 {
00058     uint8   CmdHeader[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE];   
00060 } MD_NoArgsCmd_t;
00061 
00068 typedef struct                             
00069 {
00070     uint8           Header[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE]; 
00071     uint16          TableMask;        
00073 } MD_CmdStartStop_t;
00074 
00075 
00076 
00083 typedef struct                              /* for MD_JAM_DWELL */
00084 {
00085     uint8    Header[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE];  
00086     uint16   TableId;           
00087     uint16   EntryId;           
00088     uint16   FieldLength;       
00089     uint16   DwellDelay;        
00090     CFS_SymAddr_t DwellAddress; 
00091 } MD_CmdJam_t;
00092 
00093 #if MD_SIGNATURE_OPTION == 1  
00094 
00100 typedef struct                              
00101 {
00102     uint8    Header[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE];  
00104     uint16   TableId;      
00105     uint16   Padding; 
00106     char     Signature[MD_SIGNATURE_FIELD_LENGTH];
00107 } MD_CmdSetSignature_t;
00108 
00109 #endif

00113 /* Telemetry Message Data Formats */
00114 /**********************************/
00119 typedef struct
00120     {
00121     uint8             TlmHeader[CFE_SB_TLM_HDR_SIZE];  
00122     /*
00123     ** Task command interface counters...
00124     */
00125     uint8                  InvalidCmdCntr;     
00127     uint8                  ValidCmdCntr;       
00129     uint16                 DwellEnabledMask;   
00133     uint16  DwellTblAddrCount[MD_NUM_DWELL_TABLES]; 
00135     uint16  NumWaitsPerPkt[MD_NUM_DWELL_TABLES];    
00137     uint16  ByteCount[MD_NUM_DWELL_TABLES];         
00139     uint16  DwellPktOffset[MD_NUM_DWELL_TABLES];    
00141     uint16  DwellTblEntry[MD_NUM_DWELL_TABLES];     
00144     uint16  Countdown[MD_NUM_DWELL_TABLES];         
00147     } MD_HkTlm_t;
00148 
00149 #define MD_HK_TLM_LNGTH        sizeof(MD_HkTlm_t)
00150 
00151 /**********************************/
00155 typedef struct                          /* Actual Dwell information */
00156     {
00157     uint8             TlmHeader[CFE_SB_TLM_HDR_SIZE];  
00159     uint8             TableId;         
00162     uint8             AddrCount;       
00165     uint16            ByteCount;       
00169     uint32            Rate;            
00171 #if MD_SIGNATURE_OPTION == 1      
00172     char                Signature[MD_SIGNATURE_FIELD_LENGTH];    
00175 #endif
00176 
00177     uint8             Data[MD_DWELL_TABLE_SIZE*4];   
00181     } MD_DwellPkt_t;
00182
